@correct_culture_primary_score = 100
@better_than_the_alternatives_score = 50
@always_primary_score = 1000
#Cultural names file. 
#Provinces that are new or changed are marked with #Changed. In most cases these provinces have names in CK2 that can be ported over
#Cultural naming probably won't be changed by DLC as melting pots will likely just have a tag like 'parent = x' to just take localization from the parent culture
#Porting only includes vanilla cultures and not new ones. When adding those I will only worry about areas where that culture normally would be IE I won't worry about there being a Carantanian name for Constantinople.

# EMPIRES

# special titles
k_papal_state = {
	cultural_names = {
        basque = cn_papal_state_basque # Aita Santuen Lurraldea
        catalan = cn_papal_state_catalan # Estats Pontificis
        saxon = cn_papal_state_saxon # Kerkelijke Staat
        dutch = cn_papal_state_dutch # Kerkelijke Staat
        scottish = cn_papal_state_scottish # Papdom
        frisian = cn_papal_state_frisian # Papdom
        anglo_saxon = cn_papal_state_anglo_saxon # Papdom
        norman = cn_papal_state_norman # États Pontificaux
        outremer = cn_papal_state_outremer # États Pontificaux
        french = cn_papal_state_french # États Pontificaux
        german = cn_papal_state_german # Kirchenstaat
        franconian = cn_papal_state_franconian # Kirchenstaat
        bavarian = cn_papal_state_bavarian # Kirchenstaat
        swabian = cn_papal_state_swabian # Kirchenstaat
        old_saxon = cn_papal_state_old_saxon # Pavosdom
        visigothic = cn_papal_state_visigothic # Estados Pontificios
        norwegian = cn_papal_state_norwegian # Páfagarður
        norse = cn_papal_state_norse # Páfagarður
        roman = cn_papal_state_roman # Status Pontificius
        occitan = cn_papal_state_occitan # Estats Pontificaus
        portuguese = cn_papal_state_portuguese # Estados Pontifícios
        galician = cn_papal_state_galician # Estados Pontifícios
        asturleonese = cn_papal_state_asturleonese # Estados Pontificios
        castilian = cn_papal_state_castilian # Estados Pontificios
        aragonese = cn_papal_state_aragonese # Estados Pontificios
        italian = cn_papal_state_italian # Stato Pontificio
        sicilian = cn_papal_state_sicilian # Stato Pontificio
        sardinian = cn_papal_state_sardinian # Stato Pontificio
        lombard = cn_papal_state_lombard # Stato Pontificio
        cisalpine = cn_papal_state_cisalpine # Stato Pontificio
        welsh = cn_papal_state_welsh # Pabaeth
        cumbrian = cn_papal_state_cumbrian # Pabaeth
        cornish = cn_papal_state_cornish # Pabaeth
        breton = cn_papal_state_breton # Pabaeth
    }
	color = { 255 249 198 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	landless = yes
	
	capital = c_roma
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes

	male_names = { Alexander Anastasius Benedictus Caelestinus Callistus Clemens Eugenius Leo Gregorius Hadrianus Honorius Innocentius Ioannes Lucius Marinus Martinus Nicolaus Sergius Silvester Stephanus Urbanus Victor }
}

    cultural_names = {

        catalan = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_catalan # Patriarcat Ecumènic

        norman = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_norman # Patriarcat Œcuménique
        outremer = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_outremer # Patriarcat Œcuménique
        french = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_french # Patriarcat Œcuménique
        greek = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_greek # Oikoumenikón Patriarkhíon
        mogyer = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_mogyer # Ökumenikus Pátriarkátus
        hungarian = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_hungarian # Ökumenikus Pátriarkátus
        visigothic = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_visigothic # Patriarcado Ecumenico
        roman = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_roman # Patriarchatus Oecumenicus
        occitan = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_occitan # Patriarcat Ecumènic
        polish = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_polish # Patriarchat Konstantynopolitański
        polabian = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_polabian # Patriarchat Konstantynopolitański
        portuguese = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_portuguese # Patriarcado Ecuménico
        galician = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_galician # Patriarcado Ecuménico
        vlach = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_vlach # Patriarhia Ecumenică
        asturleonese = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_asturleonese # Patriarcado Ecuménico
        castilian = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_castilian # Patriarcado Ecuménico
        aragonese = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_aragonese # Patriarcado Ecuménico
        italian = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_italian # Patriarcato Ecumenico
        sicilian = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_sicilian # Patriarcato Ecumenico
        sardinian = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_sardinian # Patriarcato Ecumenico
        lombard = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_lombard # Patriarcato Ecumenico
        cisalpine = cn_patriarchate_ecumenical_cisalpine # Patriarcato Ecumenico
    }
	landless = yes
	capital = c_byzantion # Constantinople
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

	#color = { 150 90 30 }
	color = { 183 60 155 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
}

k_danelaw = {
    cultural_names = {
        scottish = cn_danelaw_scottish # Danelaw
        english = cn_danelaw_english # Danelaw
        old_saxon = cn_danelaw_old_saxon # Dena Iagu
        frisian = cn_danelaw_frisian # Dena Iagu
        anglo_saxon = cn_danelaw_anglo_saxon # Dena Iagu
        saxon = cn_danelaw_saxon # Danelag
        german = cn_danelaw_german # Danelag
        franconian = cn_danelaw_franconian # Danelag
        bavarian = cn_danelaw_bavarian # Danelag
        swabian = cn_danelaw_swabian # Danelag
        swedish = cn_danelaw_swedish # Danalög
        norwegian = cn_danelaw_norwegian # Danalög
        norse = cn_danelaw_norse # Danalög
        danish = cn_danelaw_danish # Danalög
        volhynian = cn_danelaw_volhynian # Danelag
        russian = cn_danelaw_russian # Danelag
        severian = cn_danelaw_severian # Danelag
        ilmenian = cn_danelaw_ilmenian # Danelag
        welsh = cn_danelaw_welsh # Y Ddaenfro
        cumbrian = cn_danelaw_cumbrian # Y Ddaenfro
        cornish = cn_danelaw_cornish # Y Ddaenfro
        breton = cn_danelaw_breton # Y Ddaenfro
    }	 
	color = { 247 93 42 }
	color2 = { 220 220 0 }

	capital = c_north_riding
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture_group = culture_group:north_germanic_group
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}
}

e_black_horde = {

e_uyghur_khanate = {
    cultural_names = {
        basque = cn_uyghur_khanate_basque # Uyghur Khanerria
        scottish = cn_uyghur_khanate_scottish # Uyghur Khanate
        english = cn_uyghur_khanate_english # Uyghur Khanate
        estonian = cn_uyghur_khanate_estonian # Uiguuria
    }
	color = { 90 70 40 }
	color2= { 0 250 250 }

	definite_form = yes
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no
	capital = c_karabalgasun
	can_create_on_partition = { always = no }
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:uyghur
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
}

        cisalpine = cn_outremer_cisalpine # Oltremare
    }
	color = { 180 180 180 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }

	can_create_on_partition = { always = no }
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

		capital = c_cardiganshire # Gwynedd
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				has_culture_group = culture_group:brythonic_group
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:welsh
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:cumbrian
						culture = culture:cornish
						culture = culture:breton
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:scottish
						culture = culture:gaelic
						culture = culture:pictish
					}
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:irish
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

				limit = {
					culture = culture:gaelic
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

            castilian = cn_cornwall_castilian # Cornualles
            aragonese = cn_cornwall_aragonese # Cornualles
            swedish = cn_cornwall_swedish # Cornweal
            welsh = cn_cornwall_welsh # Cernyw
            cornish = cn_cornwall_cornish # Cernyw
        }
		color = { 204 153 10 }
		color2 = { 220 220 0 }
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				has_culture_group = culture_group:brythonic_group
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:cornish
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:welsh
						culture = culture:cumbrian
						culture = culture:breton
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		capital = c_cornwall
	}

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
			limit = { is_ai = yes }
		OR = {
		is_independent_ruler=yes
		NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
			}
				}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = culture_group:central_germanic_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		capital = c_holland #Holland
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
					NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
				}
				OR = {
					culture = culture:frisian
					culture = culture:dutch
				}
			}
		}
		
		
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:frisian
						culture = culture:dutch
					}
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

		capital = c_luxembourg #Luxemburg
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
			}
		}
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture_group = culture_group:central_germanic_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:french
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:occitan
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

            severian = cn_bosnia_severian # Bosnija

            serbian = cn_bosnia_serbian # Bosna

		capital = c_rama # Visoki

		#Titular: created by decision.
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:bosnian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:croatian
						culture = culture:serbian
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}

	k_cilician = {
	cultural_names = {
                saxon = cn_cilicia_saxon # Cilicië
                dutch = cn_cilicia_dutch # Cilicië
                old_saxon = cn_cilicia_old_saxon # Kilikien
                german = cn_cilicia_german # Kilikien
                franconian = cn_cilicia_franconian # Kilikien
                bavarian = cn_cilicia_bavarian # Kilikien
                swabian = cn_cilicia_swabian # Kilikien
                greek = cn_cilicia_greek # Kilikia
                roman = cn_cilicia_roman # Cilicia
                turkish = cn_cilicia_turkish # Kilikya
                pecheneg = cn_cilicia_pecheneg # Kilikya
                khazar = cn_cilicia_khazar # Kilikya
                cuman = cn_cilicia_cuman # Kilikya
                bolghar = cn_cilicia_bolghar # Kilikya
                bashkir = cn_cilicia_bashkir # Kilikya
                avar = cn_cilicia_avar # Kilikya
            }
		color = { 150 75 50 }
		color2= { 255 255 23 }
		
		capital = c_cilicia # Cilicia
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

	k_anatolia = {
		color = { 144 182 161 }
		color2= { 255 255 23 }
		can_be_named_after_dynasty = no 
		capital = c_lycaonia # Ikonion
		definite_form = yes
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture_group = culture_group:byzantine_group
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		color = { 223 96 96 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		
		capital = c_hayk # Ani
		
		de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
		always_follows_primary_heir = yes
		definite_form = yes

				limit = {

			}
		}
	}

	k_old_armenia = {
		color = { 223 96 96 }
		color2 = { 255 255 255 }
		
		#Here to prevent Armenia's regnal numbers getting messed up, as Bagratid Armenia counted its kings starting with Ashok I, and otherwise he'd be Ashok IV.

		capital = c_hayk # Ani
		
		can_create = { always = no } #For historical purposes only.
		no_automatic_claims = yes	#Otherwise the Bagrationi end up with weird claims in 867.

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:armenian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
	}
}

		color = { 210 165 255 }

            ethiopian = cn_corsica_and_sardinia_ethiopian # Korisīka ina Seridīnīya

			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				has_culture_group = culture_group:balto_finnic_group

		}

			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:finnish
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}

e_russia = {	#Kievan Rus
	color = { 50 150 55 }
	color2 = { 255 255 255 }
	
	capital = c_kiev # Kiev
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture_group = culture_group:east_slavic_group
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
	
	cultural_names = {
        aragonese = cn_russia_aragonese # Rusia
        asturleonese = cn_russia_asturleonese # Rusia
        basque = cn_russia_basque # Errusia
        breton = cn_russia_breton # Rusia
        bulgarian = cn_russia_bulgarian # Rusija
        castilian = cn_russia_castilian # Rusia
        occitan = cn_russia_occitan # Rússia
        catalan = cn_russia_catalan # Rússia

        cornish = cn_russia_cornish # Russi
        czech = cn_russia_czech # Rusko
        danish = cn_russia_danish # Garðaríki
        saxon = cn_russia_saxon # Gaardenrijk
        dutch = cn_russia_dutch # Gaardenrijk
        scottish = cn_russia_scottish # Rus
        english = cn_russia_english # Rus
        anglo_saxon = cn_russia_anglo_saxon # Gearadrice # Or Russland
        estonian = cn_russia_estonian # Venemaa
        finnish = cn_russia_finnish # Venäjä
        franconian = cn_russia_franconian # Gartanriki
        frisian = cn_russia_frisian # Gardarike
        pecheneg = cn_russia_pecheneg # Rusiya

        bolghar = cn_russia_bolghar # Rusiya

        german = cn_russia_german # Gärtenreich
        bavarian = cn_russia_bavarian # Gärtenreich
        swabian = cn_russia_swabian # Gärtenreich
        old_saxon = cn_russia_old_saxon # Gardariki

        hausa = cn_russia_hausa # Rasha

	capital = c_ile_de_france
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:french
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = culture:norman
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

			if = {
				limit = {

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:occitan
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:occitan
				}

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:french
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}

e_spain = {
cultural_names = {
        egyptian = cn_spain_egyptian # Isbaniyya
        maghrebi = cn_spain_maghrebi # Isbaniyya

		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:castilian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
